title: The Mind and Mood of Aging: Mental Health Problems of the Community Elderly in New York and London. By B. Gurland, J. Copeland, J. Kuriansky, M. Kelleher, L. Sharpe and L. Lee Dean. (Pp. 210; illustrated; $29.95.) The Haworth Press: New York. 1983.
